input.sentences: my walk to the beach was quite refreshing .
the rocks were hard to walk over .
some trees had a great view of the ocean .
the open vastness is fascinating to me .
i stopped by an old building and slept in it .
output.sentences: I took a refreshing walk along the beach.
On my walk, I saw waves crashing on the hard rocks.
There was a beautiful view of the sky, the trees and the ocean.,
The vastness of the ocean was fascinating.
When I got tired, I stopped and slept in a brick building nearby.
